searchQuery: Economy and Energy News in Trinidad and Tobago

results.title: Noble: Is This The Road to Growth? Can T&T Put Country Before Party?
results.summary: Noble Philip discusses Trinidad and Tobago's economic challenges, exacerbated by global crises, political infighting, and short-term resource allocation: "Our political leaders wish that we would remain blind to the reality that Cepep and URP are essentially stains on our nation." The article critiques the lack of long-term vision and the focus on political loyalties over national interests, asking, "Do we possess a leadership which can place national interests ahead of party interests?" It suggests a need for policy continuity and structural reform to foster a more diversified, resilient economy, warning against the dangers of autocracy and the importance of institutional independence.

title: Noble: Is This The Road to Growth? Can T&T Put Country Before Party?
